Class Shape

    • Model.Shape

extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Shape

        public Shape(java.awt.image.BufferedImage block,
             int[][] coords,
             Board board,
             int color)
        Default constructor for the Shape/ Tetrimo class
        Parameters:
        block - A BufferedImage of a jpeg, which is the color to use for the Tetrimo
        coords - A 2d array which represents the blocks space
        board - The game Board
        color - An int representing the color of the Tetrimo
